thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Uchumi Supermarkets Posts HY Pre-Tax Loss 895.2 Mln Shillings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Uchumi Supermarkets Posts HY Pre-Tax Loss 895.2 Mln Shillings
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Uchumi Supermarkets Ltd:
* HY ENDED DEC 2017 LOSS BEORE TAX 895.2 MILLION SHILLINGS VERSUS LOSS OF 547.3 MILLION SHILINGS YEAR AGO‍​
* HY NET SALES AND OTHER INCOMES 527 MILLION SHILLINGS VERSUS 1.85 BILLION SHILLINGS YEAR AGO
* DIRECTORS DO NOT RECOMMEND PAYMENT OF AN INTERIM DIVIDEND FOR HALD YEAR ENDED DEC 2017‍​ Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
